name: Cryptid Containment Taskforce
description:
Made for Cryptid Jam (October 2019) 

Cryptid Containment Taskforce is a turn based survival/management game about observing and  containing cryptids to protect humanity. 

* Observe and research four unique cryptids: the Wendigo, the Jersey Devil, the Kraken and the Bigfoot!

* Contain the cryptids by keeping them fed, maintaining their habitat and reinforcing the containment cells!

* Carefully manage your daily supplies to maintain the containment and protect humanity from unspeakable horrors!

Credits: Mehrdad Dehdashti, Thea Kent, Jongwoo Kim and Neha Patel
